extension.description:
VP One Page Checkout is a responsive and ajax based one page checkout plugin for VirtueMart 3 and VirtueMart 2.0/2.6. This particular package of the plugin is only compatible to VirtueMart 3. VirtueMart 2.0 and VirtueMart 2.6 compatible package of the plugin is also available. This is a commercial extension released by VirtuePlanet.com

Please remember to to enable the plugin from Plugin Manager.

You may refer to the User Guide of the plugin for detailed installation and configuration steps. For any technical support visit VirtuePlanet Support Forum.

Copyright © 2012-2015 VirtuePlanet Services LLP. All rights reserved.

field.name: style
field.label: Layout Style
field.description: Select your layout style

field.name: color
field.label: Color Style
field.description: Select your color style

field.name: responsive
field.label: Responsive Layout
field.description: Confirm if your Joomla Template is responsive.

field.name: only_guest
field.label:
Hide Registration and
Login Area
field.description: Hide Registration and Login area. Enable only Guest Checkout. 'Only registered users can checkout' option is VirtueMart Configuration must be disabled to use this feature.

field.name: show_full_pricelist_firststage
field.label:
Show Full Cart on
First Screen
field.description: In enabled, cart discount, cart tax, selected payment method, selected shipment method and cart total rows also will be displayed in the initial registration / login screen.

field.name: registration_by_default
field.label:
Registration Form
Displayed by Default
field.description: In the cart page guest checkout option is selected by default. If you enable this option then user registration option will be selected by default.

field.name: ajax_validation
field.label:
Instant Username and
Email Verification
field.description: If yes, username availability and email address verification will be done as user key-in the fields during user registration.

field.name: live_validation
field.label:
Live Username, Email
and Password Field
Validation
field.description: If no, live username, email and password strength validation will be disabled.

field.name: auto_generate_username
field.label:
Auto Generate Username
during Registration
field.description: If yes, Username will be generated automatically from E-Mail address.

field.name: hide_name_field
field.label:
Hide Name Field
in Registration Form
field.description: If yes, Username will be generated automatically from E-Mail address.

field.name: registration_message
field.label:
Custom Registration
Advantage Message
field.description: Registration advantage message displayed to guests. Keep it empty to show the default message.

field.name: email_as_username
field.label: Email as Username - Login
field.description: If yes, only E-Mail address can be used login. If both, Username or E-Mail address can be used to login.

field.name: oncheckout_show_steps
field.label: Show Checkout Steps
field.description: Disable checkout steps during checkout

field.name: hide_discount
field.label: Hide Discount
field.description: Hide discount column in cart table

field.name: hide_sku
field.label: Hide SKU
field.description: Hide SKU column in cart table

field.name: field_grouping
field.label: Address Field Grouping
field.description: If this is enabled then the address fields like name prefix, first name, last name, middle name, city, zip etc will be grouped together and displayed side by side.

field.name: check_shipto_address
field.label: BT as ST by Default
field.description: If this is enabled the checkbox for user bill to as ship to will be checked by default.

field.name: module_position
field.label: Cart Module Position
field.description: Select the module position that you want to display in the cart page.

field.name: checkout_advertisement
field.label:
Show VirtueMart Checkout
Advertisements
field.description: If yes, checkout advertisements set by coupon plugin, payment plugin and shipments.

field.name: load_jquery
field.label: Load jQuery Library
field.description: Load jQuery library. Keep it on Auto mode if you are not sure.

field.name: load_jquery_plugins
field.label: Load jQuery Plugins
field.description: Load jQuery Hover Intent and jQuery Easing Plugins if it is not already loaded in your site. Keep it on Auto mode if you are not sure.

field.name: tos_fancybox
field.label: Use Fancybox for TOS
field.description: Use Fancybox to display Terms of Service instead of default Bootstrap Modal box.

field.name: hide_system_msg
field.label: Hide System Messages
field.description: Hide unnecessary system messages generated by plugin and shipment plugin. Eg. Please accept the terms of service to confirm, Missing field Name, Missing fields etc. They will be displayed by the plugin using Ajax when relevant.

field.name: hide_custom_msg
field.label: Custom Messages to Hide
field.description: Enter the system messages (seperated by comma) which you want to hide on checkout page.

field.name: disable_ssl
field.label:
Force Disable SSL on
Non-Cart Pages
field.description: Applicable only when SSL option is enabled in VirtueMart Configuration.

field.name: default_country
field.label: Default Country
field.description: Select the country that will be selected automatically for a new user for Billing Address and Shipping Address. Select 'None' if you do not want to assign it automatically.

field.name: custom_registration_fields
field.label: Custom Registration Fields
field.description: Select which you want the user to fill-up during registration. Please note these fields data will get saved to the shopper information after the order is placed. Prior to that the data will get saved only to the cart session.

field.name: enable_recaptcha
field.label: Show Captcha (If enabled)
field.description: Show captcha in registration form if core Joomla! captcha plugin is enabled and it is also enabled in Joomla! Users Configuration.

field.name: style_radio_checkbox
field.label: Format Radio & Checkbox
field.description: When enabled the plugin will automatcally format the radio and checkbox selectors in the address fields with Javascript.

field.name: remove_unnecessary_links
field.label: Remove Extra Links
field.description: When enabled the plugin will find and remove all unnecessary / extra hyperlinks from the checkout page.

field.name: reload
field.label:
Reload Full Page After
Login & Registration
field.description: Reload the full page when a user successfully logged in or completes registration.

field.name: reload_payment_on_shipment_selection
field.label:
Reload Payment Methods
after Shipment Selection
field.description: Enable this if you need to reload the payment methods after shipment selection

field.name: reload_all_on_apply_coupon
field.label:
Reload Payment Methods
and Shipment Methods after
Coupon Code Submission
field.description: Enable this if you need to reload the payment and shipments methods after a coupon code is submited
